Become a sponsor

Sponsor

Be part of shaping the future of healthcare innovation at HAI 2026 - where breakthrough ideas and emerging technologies come together to accelerate real-world healthcare impact.

Why sponsor?

Brand Visibility

Amplify your brand with prominent logo placement across event collateral, digital platforms, and on-site signage, reaching industry leaders and decision-makers throughout the event.

Strategic Networking

Gain direct access to C-suite executives, senior decision-makers, leading researchers, and healthcare innovators. Build meaningful connections that support partnerships, catalyse innovation, and drive long-term business growth.

Speaking Opportunities

Showcase your expertise through curated panel discussions, keynote sessions and presentations, positioning your organisation as a leader in healthcare AI and innovation.

Innovation Showcase

Secure premium exhibition space to demonstrate your latest solutions and technologies. Engage directly with potential clients, collaborators, and investors in a high-impact setting.
